subject: Pro Plus Pedals
description_text:
I want to buy the pro plus pedals, do they come with screws to connect them to the cockpit if i buy it without the baseplate?

Thank you for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi Joe McLean,    When you purchase the pedals, even without the baseplate, we will include 12 sets of M6 screws and nuts by default. Please let me know if there’s anything else you’d like me to confirm!

Thank you for the quick response, i have one more question, do the pro plus pedals come with extra springs for the brake that can replace the elastomers. If not can you recommend any third party ones?


>

The pro (not plus) pedals come with the springs for the brake i believe, but the pro plus ones do not, is it possible to get the springs that come with the pro (not plus) pedals?

>
Hi Joe McLean,     Could you please provide a photo so we can confirm exactly which spring model it is? Thank you for your cooperation!

I am going to buy the pro plus pedals on the simsonn website but i found the pro pedals on amazon and it comes with these springs in the picture. I would appreciate it a lot if simsonn could put these springs in my package, and if possible could i have 2 blue ones? Thank you for your help.


>

Hi Joe McLean,    Would you consider purchasing the PlusX pedals? They feature a more precise and standardized damper configuration, offering greater stability and reliability. Or do you prefer to continue using the current pedal set with the four springs? We’re happy to recommend the best option based on your needs.

Is there a different between the brake pedal on the plus x vs the pro plus version?

>

From what i can tell the only different between the plus x and the pro plus (upgraded) is the elastomers and the dampers. Thank you for suggesting the plus x pedals but i would like to stick with the pro plus if that is the only difference in the brake. Regarding the springs for the brake, is it possible for simsonn to ship them to me when i buy the pro plus pedals? 
Kind regards 
Joe

>

Hi Joe McLean,    One more thing to note: the PlusX controller supports the VAM motor vibration interface and is compatible with SIMHUB telemetry features, while the Pro Plus controller does not support these functions.

Thank you i will take this into consideration when buying the pedals. When i buy the pedals is it possible for simsonn to add the springs in the picture i sent?

>
Hi Joe McLean,  When placing your order, please add a note saying “Include 4 colored springs as a gift.” I will inform our team to include them and ship everything together.

Thank you so much for your help, i am glad that i chose this company. But i already placed the order, and i didn’t write a message, is there anything i can do now? My order number is SSN1884.

>
Hi Joe McLean,    I’ve already informed our sales team to add a note for your complimentary gift.

Thank you for helping me, i appreciate this a lot. I will make sure to recommend simsonn to my friends for the amazing customer service.

>
Hi Joe McLean,    Thanks for the compliments, we've shipped it to you with the addition of the bonus spring . Have fun!

Hello, i just wanted to make sure that the package i bought does come with the pedals, i bought “simsonn pro plus pedal upgrade with ultimate sim racing experience”. Just making sure it’s the pedals and the upgrade not just the upgrade kit. Thank you.


>
你好，Joe McLean，      您购买了 Plus-P2-H2 踏板组，我们附赠了 4 个额外的刹车弹簧。感谢您的支持！
